properties.name: Cisco Kenna Instance URL
properties.description: The URL for your Kenna instance's portal. For example: customer.kennasecurity.com

properties.name: Kenna Notes to add to incident summary
properties.description: Do not modify. This should be empty

properties.name: Polling Interval in negative seconds
properties.description:
Need to be negatif
ex: -120

= -120 secondes

properties.name: Cisco Kenna API Token
properties.description:
This should be empty. Please speficy you global Kenna API key in 'Fetch Global Variables' action.
API token for Kenna. More information: https://apidocs.kennasecurity.com/reference#authentication
This workflow will enrich any incident with internal observable with Cisco Kenna asset context.

variables_to_update.variable_value_new: \n|Internal Observable|Kenna Asset locator|Asset Risk Score|Kenna Asset Link|\n|------------------|:----------------:|:----------------:|:----------------:|
